title: Emmerdale spoilers: Nate dies as Moira pulls a shotgun on him tonight?
text:
Her marriage to Cain Dingle (Jeff Horldley) shattered into pieces and her heart broken, Moira (Natalie J Robb) feels like she has lost everything following her affair with Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) – and she is set to lash out at him in a dangerous scene that threatens to spiral out of control in Emmerdale tonight.

As Cain simmers at the betrayal of his wife, making it clear that they are finished and he doesn’t want her near the kids, Moira is a wreck. She has tried to pick up the children but Cain is having none of it and Moira isn’t exactly getting much support from anyone else in the village.

So the last person she wants to come face to face with is Nate, who deliberately set out to seduce her in order to destroy his dad. And while it takes two to tango, Moira sees Nate as the epicentre of the disaster which has ripped her life apart and she grabs a shotgun, pointing it directly at him.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Nate has turned up at the farm to try and make amends and explain to Moira that she was never his target but it’s fair to say that his arrival in the village has been the catalyst for everything being destroyed.

As Nate tries to get her to see sense, hatred and rage fill her eyes as she contemplates pulling the trigger. Is she set to kill Nate in revenge tonight? Or can someone intervene and stop her taking action that she will regret?

The tense stand off brings an end to a week of high drama which also showed Cain discover that Nate is his son – a secret which his mum Faith (Sally Dexter) has kept from him for decades.

Emmerdale continues on Friday 25th October at 7pm on ITV.
